title: Multiliteracy-Based University Mathematics English Instructional Design for Strengthening Learner Agency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical terminology and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: A course focusing on improving English proficiency required for explaining mathematical concepts for pre-service/in-service teachers. Enhancing accessibility via smartphones and teacher-learner interaction

learning_goals: Learners can accurately translate and utilize 50 English mathematical terms.
Learners can manage their learning progress through peer assessment and feedback in a smartphone-based microlearning environment.
Learners can creatively produce math concept explanation materials using multiliteracy (text, video, infographics).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
